game.name: Granite Noir: The Social Experiment
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 게임을 영원히 바꿀 단 하나의 소원. 2시간 동안 어둠 속에서 기다리고, 소원을 빌면, 그것이 뒤따르는 이들을 위해 현실이 됩니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: One wish to shape a game forever. Wait 2 hours in darkness, make your request, and watch it become real for those who comes after.
